name: Give me gifts!
description:
Give me gifts! Match similar gifts to find the new ones! And do not forget to use your scissors to open them and see their amazing gifts!

Do you want to know which is the best gift? Then start now!!

Play on web here:

http://www.timemachineapps.com/jams/give-me-gifts/

Note: recomended version: mobile or mobile browser and sound enabled.

Tools:

  • Unity
  • Photoshop
  • Ecrettmusic Webpage
